amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the reauthorization of the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 841 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 841 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Gregg to Amendment SA 840. (consideration: CR S7181-7182; text: CR S7181-7182) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the reauthorization of the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 841 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Gregg to Amendment SA 840.
